Playstations.name: Playstation1
Playstations.description: It's evident that the value can vary significantly based on the model and its historical and collectible significance.

Playstations.name: Playstation2
Playstations.description: This price can fluctuate based on factors like the console's condition, whether it includes all original components, and its operational status.

Playstations.name: Playstation3
Playstations.description: PS3 has a lot of great games to play, and the on-rails light gun games alone make the system worth owning.

Playstations.name: Playstation4
Playstations.description: The actual cost of a Playstation 4 gaming console can vary depending on model, condition, and physical location.

Playstations.name: Playstation5
Playstations.description: The vast majority of games are still ps4 port level stuff. Base ps5 gives you access to all the best ps4 games as well as a handful of ps5 exclusives.

Playstations.name: Playstation6
Playstations.description: Is sounds as if the PlayStation 6 is coming even sooner than any of us expected

Playstations.name: PlaystationPortable
Playstations.description: Hardware shipments of the PSP ended worldwide in 2014.

Playstations.name: PlaystationVita
Playstations.description: They officially stopped supporting the Vita in 2021. No new games have been made since then.
